name: Friendship Season
description:
Friendship Season is a farming and life simulator similar to games like Harvest Moon, Stardew Valley, and Story of Seasons.

The game is in early production so many elements are still in development. This is  alpha version 1 of the game. 

What you can do (Not all of these are complete however.)

Plant Crops, Buy Seeds, Give Items, Build Items, Build Buildings, Sell Items, Talk to NPC's, Fish, Place Furniture.

What you'll be able to do

Visit the city, Visit the Beach, Ride horses, Ride vehicles, Get Married, Upgrade your house, place more furniture, more building, more items and crafting recipes. 

Controls :

WASD - Move

I - Inventory

E - Equip 

F/Mouse0 - Use Item / Talk

M - Map

Esc - Menu
